name: Hela

abilities.name: Necro Swords
abilities.details: Throws summoned swords forged from darkness.

abilities.name: Nightsword Dash
abilities.details: Dashes forward, striking enemies passed through with a larger blade.

abilities.name: Spiral Blades
abilities.details: Summons blades that spiral outwards, damaging nearby enemies.

ultimate.name: Goddess of Death
ultimate.effect: Summons massive blades erupting from the ground in a target area.
ultimate.details: Impales a large area after a brief delay, dealing high burst damage.

passives.name: Death Touch
passives.details: Damaging enemies applies a stacking 'Soul Decay' debuff, slightly reducing their healing received.

teamups.effect: Spiral Blades have increased range when activated near specified allies.

lore: The Asgardian Goddess of Death and ruler of Hel and Niflheim. Hela Odinsdottir commands legions of the dead and wields powerful dark magic and summoned weaponry.
